DOC.brief_summary: UCORBIO enroll patient undergo coronary angiography ( indication ) . The investigator draw blood moment insertion procedural arterial catheter . At moment inclusion indication , procedural detail , risk factor status , medication use quality life ( RAND-36 EuroQoL ) assess . Patients followed-up occurrence major adverse cardiovascular event 5 year . During follow-up period patient receive questionnaire every year check hospital admission . The questionnaire two five year follow-up enrich quality life questionnaire ( RAND-36 EuroQoL ) .
